<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	APPENDIX C
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	BAYTEX ENERGY LTD.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	AUDIT COMMITTEE
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	MANDATE AND TERMS OF REFERENCE
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	ROLE AND OBJECTIVE
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The Audit Committee (the "
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Committee
</FONT>
	") is a committee of the board of directors (the "
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Board
</FONT>
	") of Baytex Energy Ltd. ("
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Baytex
</FONT>
	") to which the Board
	has delegated certain of its responsibilities.&#160;&#160;The primary responsibility of the Committee is to review the interim and annual financial statements of Baytex Energy Trust (the "
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Trust
</FONT>
	") and to recommend their approval or otherwise to the Board.&#160;&#160;The Committee is also responsible for reviewing and recommending to the Board the appointment and compensation of the external auditors of the Trust, overseeing the work of the external
	auditors, including the nature and scope of the audit of the annual financial statements of the Trust, pre-approving services to be provided by the external auditors and reviewing the assessments prepared by management and the external auditors on the effectiveness of the Trust's internal controls over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The objectives of the Committee are to:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	1.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	assist directors in meeting their responsibilities in respect of the preparation and disclosure of the financial statements of the Trust and related matters;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	2.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	facilitate communication between directors and the external auditors;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	3.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	enhance the external auditors' independence;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	4.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	increase the credibility and objectivity of financial reports; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	5.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	strengthen the role of the independent directors by facilitating in depth discussions between the Committee, management and the external auditors.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	MEMBERSHIP OF THE COMMITTEE
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	1.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The Committee shall be comprised of not less than three members all of whom are "independent" directors and "financially literate" (within the meaning of National Instrument 52-110 "Audit Committees").&#160;&#160;&#160;The members of the Committee shall be appointed by the Board from time to time.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	2.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The Board shall appoint a Chair of the Committee, who shall be an independent director.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	3.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Any member of the Committee may be removed or replaced at any time by the Board and shall cease to be a member of the Committee as soon as such member ceases to be a director.&#160;&#160;The Board may fill vacancies on the Committee by appointment from among its members.&#160;&#160;If and whenever a vacancy shall exist on the Committee, the remaining members
	may exercise all its powers so long as a quorum remains.&#160;&#160;Subject to the foregoing, each member of the Committee shall hold such office until the close of the next annual meeting of unitholders of the Trust following appointment as a member of the Committee.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	MANDATE AND RESPONSIBILITIES OF THE COMMITTEE
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	1.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	It is the responsibility of the Committee to oversee the work of the external auditors, including resolution of disagreements between management and the external auditors regarding financial reporting.&#160;&#160;The external auditors shall report directly to the Committee.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PN" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<HR STYLE="COLOR: BLACK" NOSHADE SIZE="2">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage96"></A>
<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	- 2 -&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	2.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	It is the responsibility of the Committee to satisfy itself on behalf of the Board with respect to the Trust's internal control systems by:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
	&#183;&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
	&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	identifying, monitoring and mitigating business risks; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
	&#183;&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
	&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	ensuring compliance with legal, ethical and regulatory requirements.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	3.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	It is a primary responsibility of the Committee to review the interim and annual financial statements of the Trust prior to their submission to the Board for approval.&#160;&#160;The review process should include, without limitation:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
	&#183;&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
	&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	reviewing changes in accounting principles, or in their application, which may have a material impact on the current or future years' financial statements;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
	&#183;&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
	&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	reviewing significant accruals, reserves or other estimates such as the ceiling test calculation;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
	&#183;&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
	&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	reviewing accounting treatment of unusual or non-recurring transactions;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">

</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
	&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	ascertaining compliance with covenants under loan agreements;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">

	&#183;&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
	&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	reviewing disclosure requirements for commitments and contingencies;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
	&#183;&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
	&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	reviewing adjustments raised by the external auditors, whether or not included in the financial statements;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
	&#183;&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
	&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	reviewing unresolved differences between management and the external auditors;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
	&#183;&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
	&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	obtaining explanations of significant variances with comparative reporting periods; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
	&#183;&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	determining through inquiry if there are any related party transactions and ensuring that the nature and extent of such transactions are properly disclosed.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	4.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The Committee is to review all public disclosure of audited or unaudited financial information by the Trust before its release (and, if applicable, prior to its submission to the Board for approval), including the interim and annual financial statements of the Trust, management's discussion and analysis of results of operations and financial condition,
	press releases and the annual information form.&#160;&#160;The Committee must be satisfied that adequate procedures are in place for the review of the Trust's disclosure of financial information and shall periodically assess the accuracy of those procedures.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	5.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	With respect to the external auditors of the Trust, the Committee shall:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
	&#183;&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
	&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	recommend to the Board the appointment of the external auditors, including the terms of their engagement for the integrated audit;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
	&#183;&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
	&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	review and approve any other services to be provided by the external auditors (including the fee for such services); and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD;" FACE="SYMBOL, SERIF">
	&#183;&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
	&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	when there is to be a change in the external auditors, review the issues related to the change and the information to be included in the required notice to securities regulators of such change.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 48PX">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	6.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1589">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Review with the external auditors (and the internal auditor if one is appointed by the Trust) their assessment of the internal controls of the Trust, their written reports containing recommendations for improvement, and management's response and follow-up to any identified weaknesses.&#160;&#160;The Committee
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PN" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<HR STYLE="COLOR: BLACK" NOSHADE SIZE="2">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage97"></A>
<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	- 3 -&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;shall also review annually with the external auditors their plan for the audit and, upon completion of the audit, their reports upon the financial statements of the Trust and its subsidiaries.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	7.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The Committee must pre-approve all services to be provided to the Trust or its subsidiaries by the external auditors.&#160;&#160;In pre-approving any service, the Committee shall consider the impact that the provision of such service may have on the external auditors' independence.&#160;&#160;The Committee may delegate to one or more of its members the
	authority to pre-approve services, provided that the member report to the Committee at the next scheduled meeting such pre-approval and the member comply with such other procedures as may be established by the Committee from time to time.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	8.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The Committee shall review the risk management policies and procedures of the Trust (i.e., hedging, litigation and insurance).
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	9.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The Committee shall establish procedures for the receipt, retention and treatment of complaints received by the Trust regarding accounting, internal accounting controls or auditing matters and the confidential, anonymous submission by employees of the Trust's subsidiary entities of concerns regarding questionable accounting or auditing matters.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	10.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The Committee shall review and approve the Trust's hiring policies regarding employees and former employees of the present and former external auditors of the Trust.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	11.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The Committee shall have the authority to investigate any financial activity of the Trust.&#160;&#160;All employees of the Trust's subsidiary entities are to cooperate as requested by the Committee.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	12.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The Committee shall forthwith report the results of meetings and reviews undertaken and any associated recommendations to the Board.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	13.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The Committee shall meet with the external auditors at least four times per year (in connection with their review of the interim and annual financial statements) and at such other times as the external auditors and the Committee consider appropriate.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	MEETINGS AND ADMINISTRATIVE MATTERS
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	1.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	At all meetings of the Committee every question shall be decided by a majority of the votes cast.&#160;&#160;In case of an equality of votes, the chairman of the meeting shall be entitled to a second or casting vote.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	2.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The Chair shall preside at all meetings of the Committee, unless the Chair is not present, in which case the members of the Committee present shall designate from among the members present a chairman for purposes of the meeting.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	3.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	A quorum for meetings of the Committee shall be a majority of its members, and the rules for calling, holding, conducting and adjourning meetings of the Committee shall be the same as those governing the Board unless otherwise determined by the Committee or the Board.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	4.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Meetings of the Committee should be scheduled to take place at least four times per year and at such other times as the Chair may determine.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	5.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Agendas, approved by the Chair, shall be circulated to Committee members along with background information on a timely basis prior to the Committee meetings.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="LIST" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	6.&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The Committee may invite those officers, directors and employees of the Trust's subsidiary entities as it may see fit from time to time to attend at meetings of the Committee and assist thereat in the discussion and consideration of the matters being considered by the Committee, provided that the Chief Financial Officer of the Corporation shall attend
	all meetings of the Committee, unless otherwise excused from all or part of any such meeting by the chairman of the meeting.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO RULE 13a-14 OR 15d-14 OF THE SECURITIES EXCHANGE ACT OF 1934, AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO SECTION 302 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 72PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	I, Anthony W. Marino, certify that:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 72PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	1.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;I have reviewed this annual report of Baytex Energy Trust on Form 40-F;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the issuer as of, and for, the period presented in this report;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The issuer&#8217;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for
	the issuer and have:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the issuer, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(c)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the issuer&#8217;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(d)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Disclosed in this report any change in the issuer&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the period covered by the annual report that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the issuer&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The issuer&#8217;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the issuer&#8217;s auditors and the audit committee of the issuer&#8217;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent function):
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the issuer&#8217;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the issuer&#8217;s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 72PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	I, W. Derek Aylesworth, certify that:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 72PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	1.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#160;I have reviewed this annual report of Baytex Energy Trust on Form 40-F;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the issuer as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The issuer&#8217;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) for the issuer and have:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">

<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">

</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the issuer, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">

	(b)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">

	(c)

</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the issuer&#8217;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

	(d)

</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">

</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>

	5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The issuer&#8217;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the issuer&#8217;s auditors and the audit committee of the issuer&#8217;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent function):
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;

	(a)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">

</FONT>

<DIV>
<HR STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: -5PX; COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE SIZE="4">
<HR STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: -10PX; COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE SIZE="1">

<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="RIGHT">

	Exhibit 99.6
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO 18 U.S.C. SECTION 1350, AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO SECTION 906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In connection with the Annual Report of Baytex Energy Trust (the &#8220;Company&#8221;) on Form 40-F for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2009, as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on the date hereof (the &#8220;Report&#8221;), I, Anthony W. Marino, certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. section 1350, as adopted pursuant to Section
	906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that to the best of my knowledge:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>

</DIV>

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT">

	We refer to our report dated March 19, 2010 and effective December 31, 2009, evaluating the oil, natural gas and natural gas liquids reserves attributable to Baytex Energy Trust, entitled &#8220;Evaluation of the P&amp;NG Reserves of Baytex Energy Trust and Baytex Energy USA Ltd. (As of December 31, 2009)&#8221;, (the &#8220;Report&#8221;).
</FONT>
</DIV>

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

	We hereby consent to the references to our name in the Company&#8217;s Annual Report on Form 40-F to be filed with the United States Securities and Exchange Commission pursuant to the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended.
</FONT>
</DIV>

	We also confirm that we have read the Company&#8217;s Annual Information Form for the year ended December 31, 2009 dated March 26, 2010, and that we have no reason to believe that there are any misrepresentations in the information contained therein that was derived from the Report or that is within our knowledge as a result of the services
	we performed in connection with such Report.
</FONT>
